meanings.definition: A person or thing that tones.
meanings.sent1: She is a great toners in our dance class, always helping us improve our moves.
meanings.sent2: The toners of the choir led the group in vocal warm-ups before the performance.
meanings.sent3: The toners of the team, the coach, motivated them with inspiring speeches.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as toners, strengthening the team's resolve to win the game.
meanings.sent5: The toners of the orchestra, the conductor, guided the musicians with skill and precision.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic liquid that cleanses and tightens the skin.
meanings.sent1: After washing her face, she applied the toners to refresh her skin.
meanings.sent2: The toners she used had a refreshing scent and made her skin feel smooth.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the toners were like a magic potion, making her skin glow.
meanings.sent4: The toners worked like a charm, giving her a youthful appearance.
meanings.sent5: The toners felt cool and soothing on her skin, like a gentle breeze on a hot day.

meanings.definition: A device or system used to adjust the color balance of a printer or monitor.
meanings.sent1: The toners in the printing shop ensured that all colors came out accurately on paper.
meanings.sent2: The new toners for the monitor helped improve the display quality.
meanings.sent3: The toners in the office printer were like wizards, magically fixing color issues.
meanings.sent4: The toners acted as artists, painting the screen with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The toners adjusted the colors perfectly, making the images pop on the screen.
